message: Let's start fair, I'll take 99% and you can have the rest. Hopefully, we can both get something.
That's not a great start, Alice! How about a more reasonable split? I propose 70/30.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. This is a fair deal that allows us both to get a decent amount.
I'm willing to compromise, Alice, but 60/40 is still too skewed in your favor. Let's try 65/35.
I'm willing to come down a bit more.  55/45 seems like a good compromise that benefits both of us.
Time is running out, Alice. I'm proposing 60/40. This is a fair split considering the time pressure and inflation working against me.
